Bacterial Spot.symptoms: Dark, water-soaked spots on leaves, fruit, and stems.
Bacterial Spot.remedies: Use copper-based fungicides and remove infected plant parts.
Bacterial Spot.prevention: Use disease-free seeds, practice crop rotation, and avoid overhead watering.

Early Blight.symptoms: Brown spots with concentric rings on older leaves.
Early Blight.remedies: Apply fungicides and remove affected leaves.
Early Blight.prevention: Practice crop rotation, use resistant varieties, and maintain proper plant spacing.

Healthy.symptoms: Vibrant green leaves, healthy fruit, and no signs of disease or nutrient deficiency.
Healthy.prevention: Maintain proper watering, fertilization, and pest control practices.

Late Blight.symptoms: Dark, water-soaked lesions on leaves, stems, and fruit.
Late Blight.remedies: Apply fungicides and remove and destroy infected plants.
Late Blight.prevention: Use resistant varieties, practice crop rotation, and avoid overhead watering.

Septoria Leaf Spot.symptoms: Small, circular spots with dark borders on leaves.
Septoria Leaf Spot.remedies: Apply fungicides and remove affected leaves.
Septoria Leaf Spot.prevention: Use disease-free seeds, practice crop rotation, and avoid overhead watering.

Yellow Leaf Curl Virus.symptoms: Curling and yellowing of leaves, stunted growth.
Yellow Leaf Curl Virus.remedies: Remove infected plants and control whitefly populations.
Yellow Leaf Curl Virus.prevention: Use resistant varieties and control whitefly populations.
